A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved\, loved\, loved this film! The bot attack trolling this film can say what it likes\, but the characters were interesting and believable\, the pace was good (I was not bored and the film is more than 2 hours long)\, it's visually lush and the plot is really interesting. It's a lot more of an adult film than episode seven and it provokes thought\, I loved it and will see it again and again.
